synopsis: The sexually masochistic yakuza boss, Yashiro, isn't the type to warm up to others easily. But when Chikara Doumeki, his newly hired bodyguard, catches his interest, he reconsiders his "hands-off" policy with subordinates. As Yashiro's invitations fail, the yakuza boss finds out his bodyguard has a very personal reason for staying at arm's length.(Source: Digital Manga Publishing)

title.en: Twittering Birds Never Fly: The Clouds Gather
title.jp: Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather
